head.title: A Memorial Service for Jacob Lawrence

hedline.hl1: A Memorial Service for Jacob Lawrence

abstract.p: Memorial service for artist Jacob Lawrence to be held Sept 28 at Riverside Church in Manhattan (S)

block.p: A memorial service to honor Jacob Lawrence, one of America's leading modern figurative painters, will be held on Thursday at 4:30 p.m. at Riverside Church on Riverside Drive at 122nd Street in Morningside Heights. He died on June 9 at his home in Seattle at the age of 82.
Mr. Lawrence's paintings combined a Cubist-inflected style, a gift for storytelling and a social consciousness shaped by his years growing up in Harlem.
